mapper.select: SELECT rest_hairdate , sum(rest_totalprice) FROM reservation WHERE rest_state = 2 and rest_hairdate between '20/04/20' and '20/05/30' GROUP BY rest_hairdate order BY rest_hairdate ASC

select rest_hairdate, sum(rest_totalprice) as rest_totalprice from ( select nvl(a.rest_totalprice,0) rest_totalprice, cal.rest_hairdate, nvl(a.rest_state,0) from (select rest_state, rest_totalprice, rest_hairdate from reservation where rest_state =2) a full outer join (SELECT TO_CHAR(sysdate - LEVEL, 'YYYY/MM/DD') as rest_hairdate FROM DUAL CONNECT BY LEVEL < 8) cal on a.rest_hairdate = cal.rest_hairdate where cal.rest_hairdate is not null ) group by rest_hairdate order by rest_hairdate
